title: This prymer of Salysbury vse is set out a long wout ony serchyng with many prayers, and goodly pyctures in the kale[n]der, in the matyns of our lady, in the houres of the crosse in the. vii. psalmes, and in the dyryge.
author: Catholic Church.
publisher: [Per Franciscum Regnault in vico sancti iacobi, e regione maturinorum. Ad signum Elephantis],
